message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do a bit better than $75. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $82. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $78?

I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $85. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with it!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
